entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
